scripts-old.build:dist: rimraf ./dist && bun build --watch ./src/index.ts --outfile dist/skreet-prunecluster.js --minify --target browser --format esm && cp src/LeafletStyleSheet.css dist/LeafletStyleSheet.css
scripts-old.build:example: rimraf ./dist && bun build ./src/index.ts --outfile examples/skreet-prunecluster.js --minify --target browser --format esm && cp src/LeafletStyleSheet.css examples/LeafletStyleSheet.css && bun run serve
scripts-old.build:dev: rimraf ./dist && bun build ./src/**/*.ts --outdir script --target browser --sourcemap --packages external --format esm && cp LeafletStyleSheet.css script/LeafletStyleSheet.css
